title: Adobe Creative Suite 4 Design Premium + Keygen
description:
**********************************************
Adobe Creative Suite 4 Design Premium + Keygen
**********************************************

Overview
--------
Adobe Creative Suite 4 Design Premium software is the ultimate toolkit for today's designer. Take your ideas in completely new directions--with 3D, animation, and interactivity. Build on your existing skills, working efficiently across products with simplified flow and new ways of collaborating to deliver rich, expressive designs for print, web, and mobile media.

Software Packages Included
--------------------------
- InDesign CS4

- Photoshop CS4 Extended

- Illustrator CS4

- Flash CS4 Professional

- Dreamweaver CS4

- Fireworks CS4

- Acrobat 9 Pro

- Adobe Bridge CS4

- Adobe Device Central CS4

- Version Cue CS4

***********************************************************************************

Well I know there are alot of 'Adobe CS4 Master Collections' out there but here is CS4 Design Premium...

Unlike Master Editions this will fit on a single layered DVD making it easy to burn for storage and just generally taking up less space. It includes all the programs you are likely to use such as Photoshop and Dreamweaver without the bloat of others such as Afterefects :)


The .7z archive was downloaded straight from Adobe.com (with a little trickery ;) ) and all I have done is uncompress it and then re compressed it to a self-extracting archive just for all you peoples' ease of use and to reduce size :)

Keygen and all files are 100% clean so enjoy...


                                 ***********
********************************* IMPORTANT ***************************************
                                 ***********
For this to work get the updated keygen, activation patch and install instructions here... <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4713464" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4713464</a>

Replace the keygen folder in the .iso with that and you are good to go :)


Seed, enjoy :)
